name: Alien Kill II: The Final Encounter
overview: Alien Kill II: The Final Encounter is the sequel to the original game. This game like it's predecessor, is a vertically scrolling shooter developed by Dave Farrar using Chris Yates' SEUCK engine. Also like it's predecessor, it too has the option for two-plyaer co-op play. This was was released the same year as the original game, 1988. Published in ECP's "Gold Ribbon Game Pak".
publishers: ECP (Entertainment and Computer Products Pty. Ltd.)
